mapper.insert: insert into curious_post (title, content, country_id, create_date, tb_user_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{countryId}, #{createDate}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select *, tu.email as email from curious_post cp left join tb_user tu on cp.tb_user_id = tu.id left join country c on cp.country_id = c.id ORDER BY cp.create_date DESC;
select *, tu.id as userId, tu.email as email, tu.name as userName from curious_post cp left join tb_user tu on cp.tb_user_id = tu.id where cp.id = #{postId}
SELECT *, tu.email AS email, tu.name AS userName FROM curious_post cp LEFT JOIN tb_user tu ON cp.tb_user_id = tu.id WHERE cp.country_id = #{countryId}
SELECT * FROM curious_post tp WHERE (tp.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR tp.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
SELECT * FROM curious_post tp WHERE tp.country_id = #{countryId} AND (tp.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tp.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
